item.description:
Directions to Stitch House



We're headed to the brand new Stitch House in Dorchester for Knitting for Justice. Show up to work away at those projects you've been neglecting all winter and take advantage of the 10% discount offered to SoJusters that evening!

Also, in the spirit of each one, teach one we will have plenty of skilled knitters on hand to help out all you newbies. So if you've been wanting to learn how to knit - and are looking for cool people to do it with - don't miss Knitting for Justice!

So look no further if you're seeking like-minded folks to share patterns with, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while you knit one purl one, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. If you want to build a strong cross-issue social justice movement, SoJust is for you!

Want to connect outside of SoJust events? Members can view and post events, job & volunteer announcements, roommate searches, etc. on the 'Message Board' and are encouraged to suggest and co-host events.

Wanna know more about SoJust? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions and Event Photos. Learn about our Suggested Annual Membership Fee.
item.name: Knitting for Justice
